,navigation:true,pagination:{clickable:true},autoplay:{delay:3000},modules:[Pagination,Navigation,Autoplay],className:"testimonial-slider",children:testimonials.map(testimonial=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SwiperSlide,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonial-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:testimonial.img,alt:testimonial.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:testimonial.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:testimonial.text})]})},testimonial.id))})]});};export default Testimonials;
